neighborhoods.Description: Busy central districts, home to many landmarks and commercial hubs.
Up-and-coming, multicultural neighborhoods with a robust arts scene and vibrant nightlife.
Well-established, upscale neighborhoods with grand architecture, luxury boutiques, and cultural institutions.
Family-friendly neighborhoods known for their leafy streets, organic markets, and a relaxed pace of life.
Multicultural neighborhoods undergoing gentrification, known for their affordable food scenes and growing popularity among younger crowds.
